name: BoulderBikeTrailStatus
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: As part of your flash briefing, get mountain biking trail closures and restrictions for Boulder, Colorado and the surrounding area. Includes scheduled and temporary closures for Apex Park, Betasso Preserve, Centennial Cone, and many more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
